name: The Royal United Services Institute for Defence and Security Studies
goal: To study, promote, debate, report and provide options on all issues relating to national and international defence and security.
interests: Borders and Security, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence
euInitiatives:
RUSI broadly monitors and analyses:
- EU foreign policy
- European External Action Service
- The coordination of the Common Security and Defence Policy and, the EU Neighbourhood Policy.

The International Security Studies, Nuclear, and Defence Industry Groups at RUSI follow:
- Relations with Russia, Ukraine, China and the Middle East.
- Sanctions policy and nuclear proliferation
- EU Security Strategy

The National Security and Resilience (NSR) Studies Group at RUSI focuses on:

- EU Drugs Action Plan
- EU Counter-Terrorism Strategy
- Directive on Trafficking in Human Beings
- EU Cyber Security Strategy
- EUâ€™s Counter-Terrorism Coordinator actions
- 4th EU Anti-Money Laundering Directives
- Regulation on Information on the Payer Accompanying Transfers of Funds
- EU Data Protection Package
- Confiscation and asset recovery legislation
